Social media graphics

Created with Adobe Photoshop, Illustartor, InDesign

Festival Flow Kit
❮ ❯

Social media is a very powerful tool you can utilize to promote your business. Having a good looking Social Media page will make your business more attractive to your audience. For this project, I created a variety of graphics for Festival Flow Kit. It is a San Diego based start-up. The target audience of this brand are people who go to music festivals such as Coachella, Burning Man, etc. For this project, I used pictures that I took in Coachella Valley, California.

❮ ❯

Nowadays, Instagram is one of the main sources used to promote your business. Having an attractive and consistent Instagram will make your business look more professional. For this project, I created a variety of graphics for Kiwi Spa, Organic Facial Innovation Company.
